column4: HEy all, trying to help my friend with her iMac, running off live cd, the iMac crashed, I just need to get the photos off the HD before reinstall, but it won't mount, just says "not a directory" any help greatly appreciated!!!
can't they boot into safe mode or whatever a mac does when its messed
I have no idea, this is the only way I know how to do it
